summary: Changes the in-game ingredient name of "Hanging Moss" to "Hanging Vines," Meant to supplement another mod.
descriptionHtml: Nothing fancy here. This is a small plugin meant to change the name of the ingredient "Hanging Moss" into "Hanging Vines" to compliment the superb texture work done by the mod [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/57018/?]Hanging Moss replacer into plant by Pfuscher[/url]. It should reflect in most other mods, save for those that add variants of the moss for other purposes, such as [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64798/?]Campfire[/url], by Chesko.
author: arecaidianfox
